cells.data:
Office: 312 Phillips
Syllabus online (*SAKAI*)

Lecture + Wksht + Weekly HW (like DifEqs)

Leave 3rd rows empty

Today: (Augmented) Matrices, Upper Triangular Form, RREF

$100$ tickets, $3$ dollar child, $5$ dollar adult
Revenue: $422$

$$ x + y = 100 $$
$$ 3x + 5y = 422$$

Substitution is ok. Graphically it works. Subtracting the equations works pretty well. Is there something better? Matrices.

$\matrixstart 1 & 1 \\ 3 & 5 \matrixend \matrixstart x \\ y \matrixend = \matrixstart 100 \\ 422 \matrixend$

And, reduce. Augment the matrix.
